title: "Passers-by" game font
content:
This font is a vector rendition of one in an old game, which I created from bitmaps  
no more than 16 pixels high. I _think_ I got its characteristics down quite nicely, but I’m wondering if this might be an existing font. Notice the peculiar rounded left side and block serifs on the “E”. The round edges on this and other characters were hinted at by a single missing pixel ...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190104im_/http:/typophile.com/files/passers-by_4259.PNG)

 [‹ Guess these fonts and WIN!](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190104/http:/typophile.com/node/46244 "Go to previous forum topic") [BREATHLESS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190104/http:/typophile.com/node/46229 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Theunis de Jong
